skins.shipDescription: C-class destroyer ©` Crescent, Hull Number H48!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm teh C-class destroyer Crescent. I was assigned to the Home Fleet just like my sisters, but I've been to Red Sea and Indian Ocean before. I'll give you a painful reminder if you look at me like I'm a child. Hmph!
skins.acquisition: You're the Commander? You totally look like you've never fought before. I am C-class's Crescent, and I'm not a child! Despite how I look, I have a lot of experience. I'm not afraid of anything. No~thing at~ all~!
skins.login: Commander, whatcha doin? ...Ah... no... *ahem* --I didn't say anything!
skins.details: From the way you are looking at me, you must be thinking of 'this and that' kind of stuff! What?... That's... I mean lewd... Wha!
skins.secretaryIdle1: If there's anything, just leave it to me! What? ...N-Nothing at all? --Ahaha... haha...
skins.secretaryIdle2: I am su~per strong. Small fries like that just run away when they see me!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Please take proper care of a cutie like me! Because... I-I'm cute... yes!
skins.secretaryTouch: That's like child's play. Eh? ...No more? W-well, I'm an adult as well... ahaha...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Ah... ugh... that spot...!! It's fine because I'm an adult?! D-don't treat me like an idiot!

skins.shipDescription: Cute? Pretty? Is that all? Can't you expand your vocabulary a little? Jeez... Commander, you really should learn to whisper sweet nothings into my ear!
skins.acquisition: Cute? Pretty? Is that all? Can't you expand your vocabulary a little? Jeez... Commander, you really should learn to whisper sweet nothings into my ear!
skins.secretaryIdle1: O-of course! As a full-fledged lady, you can trust me with anything!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Shouldn't you give a cute lady like me some preferential treatment?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Comet, dump that stupid commander and let me be your manager!
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, are you scared? Since there's no helping it, you can hold onto my hand.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Stupid Commander! The standard for maturity isn't one's size!
